name: Onepire
description:
Use only one button to enjoy the vampire massacre in this chaotic game made by Khaotic Games Studio >:D
https://www.khaoticgames.it/home_en/

"All the other vampires in a pyre, to create an empire of one vampire"

Remeber that the blood is essential for you -.-
Steal it from your opponents and use it to attack them again, again and again!

Stay still and death will embrace you.. keep moving! Keep killing!
Because... you are the Onepire (㇏(•̀ᵥᵥ•́)ノ)
